head.title: A NEW CITIZEN AND A NEW RECORD

identified-content.classifier: Top/Classifieds/Job Market/Job Categories/Fashion, Beauty and Fitness

hedline.hl1: A NEW CITIZEN AND A NEW RECORD

abstract.p: Khalid Khannouchi of Ossining, NY, who became US citizen on May 2, wins Chicago Marathon in 2 hours 7 minutes and 1 second, an American record (S)

block.p: Khalid Khannouchi of Ossining became a United States citizen on May 2, too late to recover from an injury and compete for his new country in the Olympics. But he entered its record books last Sunday, winning the Chicago Marathon in 2 hours 7 minutes 1 second, an American record. His wife, Sandra, draped him in an American flag at the finish line. ''This one is for America, not for me,'' said Khannouchi, a native of Morocco. The previous year in Chicago, Khannouchi set the world marathon record of 2:05.42.

Khalid Khannouchi of Ossining became a United States citizen on May 2, too late to recover from an injury and compete for his new country in the Olympics.
